reviewText: Christi always encourage you to workout, this fascinating DVD has all you need. I especially liked the STEP part and the aerobics.

Christi Taylor is my favorite video instructor ... I'm not the most coordinated person, but I love the challenge of learning her choreography, as my mind is concentrating on the moves instead of the butt-kicking workout.

I am a Christi Taylor fan! In this set of DVD I got 3 of her older workouts. The step is really good but the floor aerobic / Happy Hour / was very difficult to follow. The toning is ok but not advanced!
